customCommands.name: test
customCommands.description: Run tests for the current file
customCommands.prompt: Write unit tests for the selected code. Use the testing framework already in use in this project (Bun test for TypeScript, pytest for Python).

customCommands.name: review
customCommands.prompt:
Review this code for bugs, security issues, and improvements. Focus on:
1. Error handling
2. Type safety
3. Performance
4. Security vulnerabilities

customCommands.name: doc
customCommands.prompt:
Generate comprehensive documentation for this code including:
1. Description of what it does
2. Parameters and return values
3. Usage examples
